I am 6’1” and usually wear an XLT for jackets when I can get it so there is enough length in the torso.  When an XLT isn’t available, I’ll go for an XXL and it usually fits OK.  Vests seem to be different as many XXL vests look too wide and have a sloppy fit on me.  Nevertheless, I took a chance and got an XXL for this vest.  It fits great!  It has a perfect length and width for me.  The fleece lining is substantial enough to provide a good deal of warmth.  The outer shell seems durable but is not as rough to the touch and stiff as other brands like Carhartt.  There are plenty of pockets on the inside and outside.  This is priced much cheaper than other work vests, but don’t let that scare you off.  This is an excellent buy!

评论概述: Nice vest, warm soft material inside
评论详情: I got this vest for my husband and he loves it. We bought two of them. One in the green and the other in the brown. We brought them on our hunting trip and he loved having them to keep him warm. Just make sure you hang dry them.
So soft and comfy. Your girlfriend will steal it! Great value.
This is very well made. the stitching is good and it fit very well. I can't wait for the weather to get a little cooler as this is a very warm vest.

The pictures of this vest make it look like a very popular competitor, and I have to say that in person, it looks that way, too. This is a very well-made vest. The lining is very soft, and all the pockets are functional and easy to access. I have worn this several days all day at work when it was colder, and I was comfortable all day.  I didn't even discover the front chest pocket until I had worn it for three days because there are also inside pockets on both sides.  I am thoroughly impressed with how nice of a vest this is at this price point. I went with the dark grey version, but I like it so much I may order another one. This could be used in fall, spring or even some winter months if it's not too cold.

The men's vest from the Tuaova Store arrives packed in a zip seal bag.  The vest is a fleece lined, polyester waterproofed outer, zip up work vest, comparable to the famous "vehicle-aorta" brand. It has a left-chest pocket, two front pockets, and two inside pockets with double needle stitching and a durable copper zipper.  The vest runs true to size, but is a roomy fit to allow for multiple layers.  Good value.

This is a nice durable and thick workwear vest. It comes a little big, so you might not want to order a size up if you're on the boarder. My husband is looking forward to wearing this in the coming winter months!

评论概述: Thick and heavy duty, a bit big.
评论详情: I was surprised by how heavy duty it seemed. The lining inside isn't overly puffy but still excels at retaining heat, the outside is made of a pretty heavy duty material that reminded me of thick denim. The zipper does seem to get stuck at the very bottom when trying to open it up. I also really like the multiple pockets so I have many different options for storing things. The vest is a bit on the big side though. The shoulder area is wide and a bit stiff so there's always a pretty large gap around my shoulders. The bottom is also a bit wide so it doesn't fit as snug as I expected. I wear 3x for all of my jackets, sweaters, vests, etc; but it might be a good idea to size down one size with this.
